title: Auto-Start Onboarding Tour After App Hydration
description: Verify that the onboarding tour automatically starts once after the app hydration completes and does not restart unexpectedly.

steps.description: Launch the FC Onboarding App.
Wait for the app hydration process to complete.
Check that the onboarding tour automatically starts immediately after hydration.
Verify the onboarding tour does not restart again without manual intervention.

title: Manual Restart of Onboarding Tour via Coach Button
description: Ensure that tapping the coach button manually restarts the onboarding tour and the button styling matches Hanwha brand guidelines.

steps.description: Launch the app and wait for the auto-start onboarding tour to complete or skip it.
Locate the coach button styled per Hanwha brand colors on the home screen.
Verify the coach button styling matches the Hanwha palette and style specifications.
Tap the coach button to start the onboarding tour manually.
Confirm the onboarding tour restarts and overlays and tooltips appear as expected.

title: Custom Coachmark Tooltip Content and Styling
description: Validate that the custom coachmark tooltip displays accurate Korean text labels and CTA icons, and is styled with shadows and spacing for readability.

steps.description: Trigger the onboarding tour to display coachmark tooltips.
Verify that all tooltip texts are displayed in Korean with correct grammar and wording.
Check that each tooltip includes the specified call-to-action icons.
Confirm that tooltip layout includes proper shadows, spacing, and matches design requirements for readability.

title: TourGuideProvider Overlay Positioning and Vertical Offset
description: Verify that the TourGuideProvider wraps the home screen and positions overlays correctly with adjustable vertical offset applied.

steps.description: Launch the app and start the onboarding tour.
Confirm that the overlays are positioned correctly on the home screen elements.
Adjust the vertical offset configuration (if possible via test harness or dev mode).
Verify that overlays reposition accordingly respecting the vertical offset parameter.

title: Progress Card Header and Status Highlight with TourGuideZone
description: Check that the progress card header and status are wrapped in TourGuideZone and highlighted with rectangular overlays as per design.

steps.description: Trigger the onboarding tour to display overlays.
Verify that the progress card header and status areas are highlighted with rectangular overlays.
Confirm that the highlighted areas correspond to the correct UI elements as specified.

title: Progress Bar Component Display and Accuracy
description: Ensure the progress bar component correctly displays active and completed steps inside a non-collapsable container for accurate onboarding progress visualization.

steps.description: Start the onboarding tour.
Check the progress bar displays the current active step correctly.
Complete a few steps in the onboarding tour.
Verify that completed steps are visually indicated as done in the progress bar.
Confirm the progress bar container is non-collapsable and maintains consistent layout.

title: Overlay Rendering and Performance on Supported Devices
description: Validate that overlays and tooltips render correctly on all supported devices with no layout, styling issues, or performance regressions.

steps.description: Run the app with onboarding tour on multiple supported iOS and Android devices and screen sizes.
Confirm overlays and tooltips display correctly without clipping, overlap, or misalignment.
Verify that UI remains responsive and animations smooth during the tour.

title: Dependency Integration Validation: rn-tourguide and react-native-svg
description: Ensure that rn-tourguide and react-native-svg dependencies are correctly integrated and do not cause app crashes or degrade performance during the onboarding tour.

steps.description: Launch app and start onboarding tour dependent on rn-tourguide overlays and react-native-svg rendering.
Observe and confirm no errors or warnings are emitted related to these dependencies.
Verify smooth rendering of overlays and no memory leaks or performance drops occur.

title: Error Handling: Tour Start Failure
description: Test how the app handles scenarios where the onboarding tour fails to start after hydration (e.g., due to state errors or timeout failures).

steps.description: Simulate failure or delay in canStart guard or timeout mechanism preventing tour start.
Verify the app does not crash and displays fallback UI or error messages appropriately.
Attempt manual restart using the coach button.
Ensure manual restart still works and triggers the tour even after auto-start failure.

title: Localization Validation of Korean Labels in Tooltips and UI Elements
description: Validate accuracy and completeness of Korean labels in all coachmark tooltips and highlighted UI elements during the onboarding tour.

steps.description: Navigate through the entire onboarding tour.
Confirm that all text labels in tooltips and highlighted UI components are displayed fully in Korean.
Verify no untranslated English or garbled characters appear.
